title: Gribouille = Heart of Paris
description: Camille Moresteau is serving on a jury in a murder trial. Moresteau takes pity on Nathalie Rougin and invites her to move in with his family for the duration of the trial. Moresteau's son Claude takes an immediate interest in Nathalie while suspecting his father to have views on the young woman. Sensing her presence is causing tension in the family, Nathalie prepares to leave but not before she has stolen some valuables from the Moresteaus. The film was remade as 'The Lady in question' in 1940 by Charles Vidor.  Credits: Producers, Andre Daven, Roger Le Bon ; director, Marc Allegret ; writer, Marcel Achard, H. G. Lustig ; photography, Armand Thirard, G. Benoit, Michel Kelber ; music, Georges Auric ; art direction, Alexandre Trauner. Cast: Raimu, Michele Morgan, Pauline Carton, Gilbert Gil, Jacqueline Pacaud, Julien Carette, Jean Worms, Bernard Blier, Jacques Baumer, Andrex.
